nodes.documentation: @dev Override deposit and track how much has been contributed by a user.
nodes.name: deposit

nodes.documentation: @dev Override deposit and track how much has been contributed by a user.
nodes.name: deposit

close().details: Allows for the beneficiary to withdraw their funds, rejecting further deposits.

deposit(address).details: Override deposit and track how much has been contributed by a user.

enableRefunds().details: Allows for refunds to take place, rejecting further deposits.

state().return: The current state of the escrow.

transferPrimary(address).details: Transfers contract to a new primary.

withdrawalAllowed(address).details: Returns whether refundees can withdraw their deposits (be refunded). The overridden function receives a 'payee' argument, but we ignore it here since the condition is global, not per-payee.
